Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, fabric grey in section, interior pitted and grooved, with remains of two lines of thick black-painted hieratic text on the exterior from formula for supply of incense.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393136) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393136)
